entry.title: Welcome My Friend!
entry.content:
This is my first post of my blog.
I want to write down all the amazing technology that I will learn and keep it in my blog for a record. This is a good way to learn new technology and improve myself and share or discuss technology with technology people. It is wonderful to learn together and share happiness and sorrow.
Except for technology post, I will also show some stuff in daily life and share some music, photos and other interesting stories.
Anyway, Keeping learning everyday, Keeping reading everyday and Keeping happiness everyday.
